name: south bay shawlette
sizes_available: 46 in. (117 cm), at widest point, 21 in. (53.3 cm) at longest point
notes:
> this light and airy triangle shawl is soft and elegant. *lion brand yarn*

lion brand pattern #: 90489ad

skill level:  advanced intermediate

size: one size
about 46 in. (117 cm), at widest point, 21 in. (53.3 cm) at longest point

484-147 lb collection silk mohair: iris 2 balls

crochet hook - size i-9
split ring stitch markers

shawlette begins at center back neck and is worked in rows down to lower edge.

pattern diagram key is provided.


see [mother of the bride shawl][1] for the vanna’s choice/vanna’s glamour version.

  
  [1]: http://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/mother-of-the-bride-shawl
